en-US.title: Calling for Speakers
en-US.text: For this year's summit, we hope that it will become a communication platform to enable people to take part in social change. We sincerely invite and welcome old and new participants who are interested in the following topics to send us their submissions, so that we can combine our strengths and become a united force for practical change: Administration, Crowd, Oversight, Participatory Democracy, Activism and Mobilization, New Media, Citizen Science, Disaster, Care and Welfare, Environment, Education, Art & Design, Anything related to Open Collaboration and Civic Tech.

zh-TW.title: 徵求講者
zh-TW.text: 今年我們將再次舉辦 g0v Summit 零時政府 2016 高峰會，希望能成為運用科技與群眾參與改變社會的交流平台。我們誠摯的邀請關注以下議題的各方，無論過去是否有參與 g0v，都歡迎投稿。我們徵求關於以下主題的演講議題：政府行政，群募與眾包，監督政府，參與式民主，社會運動與動員，新媒體，公民科學，災防，照護，環境，教育與開放教材，藝術與設計，其他與開放協作、公民科技相關的主題。報名網址位於
